posts.post_content: Ironically enough, this is one Rakdos card I probably *won't* want to unleash. The deathtouch arguably makes her better as a defender than as an attacker. Although, if your opponent has tramplers on his side, it may not matter as much.

Posted By: Avensai (9/26/2012 1:05:23 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This is a great card.  
A 1/2 death-toucher for two mana is already nice by itself.  
And for being a creature with Unleash,  
she's a surprisingly good defensive option if you decide not to put a +1/+1 counter on her.  
This makes her useful even later in the game to get rid of fatties on the ground.  
  
Also she gets pretty cruel with [Oona's Blackguard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oona's Blackguard) if you unleash her.
posts.html:

A 1/2 death-toucher for two mana is already nice by itself.
And for being a creature with Unleash,
she's a surprisingly good defensive option if you decide not to put a +1/+1 counter on her.
This makes her useful even later in the game to get rid of fatties on the ground.

Also she gets pretty cruel with Oona's Blackguard if you unleash her.

Posted By: Mode (9/30/2012 1:36:02 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Comparing this to [Thornweald Archer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thornweald Archer), it would seem like the Assassin here is a much better creature what with the potential for becoming a 2/3. However, considering it lacks reach and--most importantly--to get the +1/+1 it loses the ability to block, the Archer has the upper-hand. Perhaps it's just my play style, but I find deathtouchers work best as blockers, intimidating, taunting my opponent to attack as opposed to using them as quasi-unblockable creatures, letting my opponent decide the best outcome. Therefore, this is a card that probably would benefit most from not being unleashed and as such, being a 1/2 with deathtouch for 1B is good for Limited, but probably has better choices in Constructed.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: What no one has commented on is the fact that this is a 1b HUMAN with deathtouch. Perfect for blocking early red aggro creatures early on, great for intimidating the big fatties your opponent may want to attack you with and excellent for sacrificing to a certain aristocrat. Played in conjunction with blood artists it is definately a winner. As what others have said though the unleash it only useful in very limited situations but it is still a human with death! Hurray!
posts.html:
